ul.li: Enabling L1 as part of the ReadApi
L1 is up and running
but not fully puppet-ized
no write access to rpm repo yet
Perform baseline benchmark
Created new TTOM model with a common name model: TTOM-Name.
This model is reused among TTOM sub models but contains no conceptual differences.
But this introduces submodels with submodels.
Validated that full stack works with TTOM 3.9
Released all components
JBehave test confirmation that we don't have regression

header.h3: Boosting cleanup: Remove Boosting on read path

ul.li: Support multiple models on client side
Allow to attach multiple TTOM model dependencies (with different version) on client side
Real use case: Bulk QA will be able to work on content in different TTOM models using the same client
Using full qualified names for each dictionary element
Required updates in Coredb read path components, CSV Creator and Coredb Load Scripts
Tested on BEL dataset with set of ReadOnly FATs with TTOM 2_3 and 3_9 attached
Using full qualified names increased database footprint
..which can be reduced by putting property_names into dictionary
Updated CSV Creator to fill dictionary
Updated Coredb Load Scripts to provide new database structure
Update db-reader SQL queries to match new database structure
end-to-end validation

header.h3: Model update: Names. Changes for Road Element

ul.li: Introduce new name model according to foundation team recomendation
Deliver all names on Road Elements according the new names model
Mapping document for the name changes on Road Element

Implementation Tif2TTom:
Official and Alternate Names on Road Element
Route Names and Route Numbers on Road Element
Tourist Road Names on RoadElement and Ferry Connections
Structure/Brunnel Names on Road Element, Ferry Connections and Railways
Grouped names with transliterations
Added primary flag to names
